short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds saved replies to GitHub's saved replies list when commenting on issues or pull requests.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shared Saved Replies allows teams using GitHub to easily share and keep GitHub issue and pull request saved replies up to date.  See the website for details on how to use the extension.
